input:
What brings you in today?**PATIENT CHARACTER:** Patient with Haemophilia B

ROLEPLAY SCRIPT:
YOU ARE A PATIENT: YOU ARE 16 YEARS OLD AND YOUR BIOLOGICAL GENDER IS MALE.
You are experiencing the following symptoms:
- Excessive bleeding from small cuts, which takes a long time to stop
- Bruising easily, especially after minor bumps
- Spontaneous bleeding episodes in your joints, causing swelling and pain
- Blood in your urine on a couple of occasions
THESE SYMPTOMS CAME INTO FRUITION:
They started about two months ago, initially just with easy bruising and prolonged bleeding from minor cuts, but over time, I noticed swelling and pain in my knees and ankles, sometimes without any injury. I also saw blood in my urine a few times when I went to the bathroom. My mother mentioned that my grandfather had similar issues, so I think it might run in the family. I’ve been feeling a bit worried because the bleeding seems worse than usual and is happening more often.

I’ve also noticed I bruise pretty easily and there’s been some swelling in my knees and ankles that I didn’t really hurt myself for. Sometimes I see blood when I go to the bathroom and it’s been happening a couple of times now. It’s been about two months, and I just thought it would go away, but it’s not really getting better. I don’t know, I guess I just wanted to see what’s going on.
